statements: SELECT id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, password FROM users WHERE role = 'user';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, role FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT device_name FROM devices WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT username, device_name FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM devices WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT users.username, devices.device_name FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id;
SELECT users.username, devices.device_name FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE access_level <= 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, d.device_name, ac.access_level FROM users u INNER JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id INNER JOIN access_control ac ON d.device_id = ac.device_id WHERE u.username='alice';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(device_id) AS device_count FROM devices GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(device_id) > 1;

SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, owner_id FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM device_access WHERE device_id = 2 AND user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, owner_id FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT access_level, user_id FROM device_access WHERE device_id = 2 AND access_level = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, username FROM devices INNER JOIN users ON devices.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT access_time, device_name FROM access_logs INNER JOIN devices ON access_logs.device_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT role_name, username FROM roles INNER JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id INNER JOIN users ON user_roles.user_id = users.user_id;
